question: Who is the author of the book "Every Time It Rains"?
explanation: The book \"Every Time It Rains\" has been authored by Nikitha Singh. It is the sequel of author\'s \"Like a Love song\" , in which Mahi and Laila were the protagonists with the story from Mahi’s perspective. The book \"Every Time It Rains” revolves around Laila’s life, how she picks up the broken pieces of her shattered heart and whether she gives love another chance in her life remains a mystery till the end.
